com.spid.android.sdk.request

Class SPiDRunnableRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spid.android.sdk.request.SPiDRunnableRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SPiDApiGetRequest, SPiDApiPostRequest, SPiDTokenRequest

    public class SPiDRunnableRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Contains a runnable request to SPiD

      • getCompleteURL

        public java.lang.String getCompleteURL()
        Returns:
        The complete URL with the query

      • onPostExecute

        protected void onPostExecute(SPiDResponse response)
        Called after run completes. Runs on the same thread as the run request, ie not the main thread. If updates to UI is required or any other action that needs to run on the main thread it needs to be handled in the SPiDRequestListener registered with this SPiDRunnableRequest.
        Parameters:
        response - The response passed from the run method

      • authenticateRequest

        public void authenticateRequest()
        Authenticates by appending the access token to the request

      • setMaxRetryCount

        public void setMaxRetryCount(int maxRetryCount)
        Maximum retry count for the request, used when token expires and the request needs to be retried after a new token has been obtained
        Parameters:
        maxRetryCount - Max retry attempts

      • run

        public void run()
        Executes the request and sends the response to the registered SPiDRequestListener
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
